main event: On November 6, 1967, a luminous, oval-shaped object was observed in the sky over Treysa, Germany.
interesting points: The object emitted a bright white light and was observed for approximately 30 minutes., The object moved slowly at first, then accelerated rapidly before disappearing from view., The sighting was made by 3 military personnel., Mr. Hans Steffen, a witness, described the object as disc-shaped., The case remains under investigation.
